page.title: 18BUILDINGS
page.content: All around Ashover there are all different types of houses,new and old. In the church there are stone arches. There are stained glass windows.Around Ashover there are a few shops.An Antique shop and Ye Old Tuck Shop are two of them.Samantha Cook's house has got big black gates.The people who owned it a long time ago used to salt pigs in a big sink and the sink is still there.The house has also got leaded windows. .ASHOVER HILL SCHOOL. On the front of the old school,there is a sundial made of stone.It has ivy on the wall and three windows are blocked off.Also it has high walls. .AMBERSTONE HOUSE.(new). 1 heated indoor swimming pool. Garage for four cars and a split level garden on slope.
